description:
With over 12 hours of video content, Voice Recording Bootcamp provides in-depth, hands-on training and production by professional audio engineers that allows students to produce studio quality work for auditions and jobs. If you can send an email, you can do this.

Topics include:

  • Creating a great recording space anywhere
  • Microphones, preamps, and digital interfaces
  • Setting up your DAW
  • Finding the right equipment for your budget
  • Recording and editing your voice over
  • Fixing breaths, pops and mistakes
  • Computer basics- understanding file types and file naming
  • Keeping your work organized
  • Cleaning up and enhancing your work with effects
  • Compression
  • Normalization
  • Noise reduction
  • Equalization
  • Using the internet to get voice over jobs
  • Job estimating and bidding
  • Using your special skills to get more work
  • Exploring job websites to sharpen your marketing
  • Finding out what the client needs, and delivering it
  • Getting paid what you're worth
title: Voice Recording Bootcamp
